content: So happy to announce that Health in iOS 15 will fully support import and storage of SMART Health Cards, and a new API for apps to request access to cards a user may have stored. Talk about how that all works goes live tomorrow here: https://developer.apple.com/wwdc21/10089
Congrats @Pascal Pfiffner and the rest of the Apple team! Looking forward to watching
This is great @Pascal Pfiffner ! Can't wait to try out these new APIs!
